content.detailedDescription:
The encounter, or rather my memories of the event has to be divided into two chapters.

chapter i

a friend and i were driving from garden city to ypsilanti.  we left my house at 7:30pm; i was driving.  we were taking ford rd. (rte 153).  back then, ford rd. through canton township and further west was still quite rural, no traffic. we were listening to wmjc on the radio.  the dj said it was 8:01 and then static, i thought nothing of it, it was in that area that you would lose the detroit radio staions and start to pick up the ann arbor stations.  i had just reached down to adjust the radio dial then flash!!!!  everything lit up. . . green!!!!  we were so frickin' startled i don't know how i maintained control of the car.  i turned off the radio and we started looking around and listening.  nothing!  it had been almost as light as daylight, except it was green. it was so light out that we would have been able to read the license on the car ahead of us had we been close enough.  we were quite shaken, to say the least, and things seemed a bit fuzzy.  we made the obvious remarks: what was that?  did you see anything?  was there a helicopter or something?  by that time we had made the left turn onto plymouth rd. and had travelled a little more than a mile.  i asked j. the time in case there was something to report.  it was 8:30pm!  that shook us up almost as much as the flash of green.  we had lost almost one half hour.  i know i slowed down considerably from the 55-60 mph i had been driving on ford rd. and of course we made the turn.  we reached our destination a little after 9:00pm.  that trip normally takes 45 minutes to one hour.  i have driven that route, or some variation probably hundreds of times.  i even commuted to u of m for a summer semester making that same drive; so i know the route and how long it takes.
in case anyone wants to know, we had not been drinking nor were we under the influence of any substance.

chapter ii

i used to go to a [well-known] hynotist in the detroit area.  a hypnotist with a phd, not one who does shows at the mall and makes you act like a chicken.  i went back to see her, perhaps there was more to the incident.  it took a few times to get beyond that initial shock of seeing everything light up.  despite being in a deep state of hypnosis i kept 'waking up'.  i think it was on our fourth attempt that i was able to continue, and that is when i remembered seeing it, the thing, the spacecraft, the ufo!  although under hypnosis i was moving around as if it was happening the.  i was physically going through all of the actions.  i could even feel the steering wheel as i turned my head and body, looking out the driver's window-

doctor:     "what are you doing steven?  
me          "i'm looking at it."
doctor:     "what do you see steven?" 
me:         "the spaceship!"

i guess something changed at that time in what i was doing -

doctor:    "what is happening now?"
me:        "it stopped."
doctor:    "what stopped?"
me:        "everything!!!!"

despite numerous attempts, i could never get beyond that point,and to this day i get goosebumps whenever i think about it.  there were cassette tapes made of our sessions.  unfortunately they are long gone.  i mention the  tapes because i wanted some friends to listen just to verify that the doctor did not try to influence my memories.

finally after more than 30 years i have made a report of what my friend and i witnessed.  thank you.
content.summary: The most significant aspect of the encounter was the loss of time!!!The

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the hottub with my husband looking at the sky. i noticed behind trees orange lights appearing above me.I told my husband "what is that". he saw object too. was aprox 7 bright orange glowing lights close to each other in v shape birdflight formationin at very fast speed. object changed shape as if birds where changing flightpath then suddenly dissapeared( did not fade off). we noticed there was no sound before ,during or after the appearance.Object seemed very bigh fast v shaped and quiet.
content.summary: Bright orange lights in birdflight pattern.Aprox 7 lights.Nosound.Changed shape then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
After my first observation on the previous night, i have spent more time looking skyward to see if i can identify another ���moving star.���

at the noted time, i saw a small red star begin to move and travel a few degrees eastward.  it then curved slightly to the south for several degrees before returning to its original eastward direction.  it then stopped abruptly and did not move again.  this star was fairly dim and not very noticeable.  total travel was around 10 degrees.  it was nearly directly overhead and looked like any other normal star before during and after movement.  

i went inside to warm up and returned outside for a check on the stars position.  being as the star was so dim, i could no longer find it among the other stars, so its location was now uncertain.

at this point i checked the green southern star that i had seen move the previous night.  it appeared in its normal position and had tracked through its normal range of movement, at least as far as i could tell.
content.summary: Small red star moved in non star like manner.

content.detailedDescription:
Four nights ago i was outside working on a generator.  i happen to be adjusting one of my floodlights which was atop my van.  this stationary object made it blatantly clear that the star behind was moving!

thinking i was seeing things, i concentrated on this star and watched it move quite some distance and then come to a full stop.  the color never changed, being a standard green star color.  it continued to twinkle as well.  i then stood there watching it for some time high in the southern sky.  it never moved again, which in and of itself was very odd.  stars normaly appear to very slow track through the night sky due to the earth���s rotation.  even several hours later, this star had not moved as it should.

well the fact that i caught this star moving against a stable foreground object was a complete accident.  in the past, i have seen stars do this before, but i always chalked it up to either an optical illusion or my imagination.  however now that i have seen a star unmistakably move, they are far easier to spot.  over the past few nights, star movement is so common as to make me think i am seeing things again!  

however my wife, whom i said nothing to about stars moving, witnessed one herself and excitedly told me to look at it.  this independent confirmation has convinced me that i am not seeing things at all.  there are objects that appear to be stars behaving in a most un-star like fashion and they are common enough that even casual observation will confirm their existence.

this is but one of three other events, separate posts to follow.
content.summary: A star that moved in an un-star like fashion

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday october 29th around 9:00 p.M. i and 3 other co-workers were leaving the restaurant when one of us spotted something sw in the sky over a one story building, either above or in the fog cover.It was brighter than a halogen street light across the two lane road, glowing a bright orange-yellow color. we watched it for minute or two rise and fall and continue on a northern flight path. then as quickly as it appeared it faded out.

after it disappeared, we stood around trying to figure out what we just saw. 2 of the people went back in the restaurant to finnish locking up and i and my friend made our way across the street to my car, when it appeared again in the same spot in the sky. it appeared to change direction and head right for us so we made our way across half the street and over to the restaurant and alerted the other to who had seen it previously. when we got next top the restaurant it appeared to change direction and head on a northern flight path when it faded out again. 

the 4 of us stood there awe struck when on of the witnesses got on their cell phone and called their mother who was at home 8 miles away and said they had seen something matching the description over a town 14 miles north. while the person was on the phone it appears in the same place in the sky again changed direction as it did the 2 times prior and blinked out.

when it flew by at it's closest i saw what looked like 3 round white-yellow lights on the bottom with a ring of oscillating lights above.

i have never in 25 years of living in this area, seen anything like this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Ufo over yachats oregon.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from a dance club, and noticed in the sky a bright light, looked like a fireball, i thought it was a shooting star but it wasn't high enough and wasn't moving. then the bright colors diminish, then at the same spot it lighted up again,
content.summary: first it was small don't remember the color, then  it brightened and looked like a huge fireball yellow, orange, white

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from work after 11:30 pm car facing north.Saw the first lite in sky,it was steady fairly high,put my car in my drive and walked to an electric poll to line object up to see if it was moving.It was steady but its lite or it a bright orange  lite went out after 30 secands. started to walk back to my home when the next 3 rose up from behind the tree line and then went to the west,there was a small breese from the west.I ran into my home and to my wife to show her out our north bedroom window.We could see 2 of them through my brothers maple tree  located 400 feet to the north of us,100 ft tall tree,lites were near the top and then they were gone.I went down stairs and me wife called to me that 2 more had appeared,they also vanished after 2 minuted. we are located about 30 miles south of lake erie and 2 miles south of rt 20,the lites could have  ben any where in between here and the lake,a bright steady orange lite.
content.summary: 6 orange balls rose from  behind tree line,1 then 3 then 2 they seemed miles away moved to the west and then winked ouut

content.detailedDescription: Was pulling out of a parking lot in huntington beach ca on oct. 29 2011  when i saw what appeared to be a flock of birds fighting in the sky but very far away.. it took me a second to realize birds really dont fly like that and what were "they" circling very quickly? took out my iphone and recorded what i could but when i got home its very hard to see with it being daylight out. i did do a frame by frame (not a professional) and to the right of the tree on the left you can make out a few of them.. but they flew around in a crazed circle (like birds fighting) then que'ed up in a line and took off towards the northwest which coming from oc is directly over la.. maybe you can "clean up" the video to see what i saw. im hoping someone else got this from a better vantage point.
content.summary: Looked like birds

content.detailedDescription:
Regarding mufon #32939, i found the newspaper article in the albuquerque journal regarding the missing businessman from japan you cited in your submission.  following is a copy of the article from the paper (i believe the date is correct, if not the 28th, it was the 29th).  thanks.

albuquerque journal sept 28, 2002

white sands national.Monument
��� two hikers have discovered a body believed to be that of a japanese businessman who has been missing since sept. 8 in the shifting white gypsum sands of the national monument near alamogordo. the body found saturday was believed to be that of kazuomi fujita, a 29-year-old textiles executive who had wanted to extend his visit so he could see white sands national monument. "at this time there doesn't appear to be any foul play," said. norbert sanchez, chief of detectives for the otero county sheriff's department. fujita's, passport' was found beside the body 2 miles south-southwest of where his vehicle was found on the 145,000-acre national park. the body was sent to the state office of the medical investigator in albuquerque for an autopsy.  fujita's last night at his motel was supposed to have been sept. 7. his rental car was found sept. 9 in the park at closing time. rescue crews spent the following day searching with an army helicopter.  on wednesday, all-terrain vehicles were used in a ground search. a pair of search dogs did, however, pick up fujita's scent, investigators said. and a faint footprint was found at the
park's northern end. people do sometimes get lost among the many dunes. at sunset, the sands sometimes begin to blow along the rippled surface of the dunes, covering footprints, which some visitors might have counted on to lead them back to their car.  "most of our searches for visitors find the individuals within two hours, or they walk out on their own," park superintendent jim mack has said.  the previous week, fujita had visited his tokyo-based company's new york office, seen the metropolitan museum of art and attended a yankees game. "he was a happy, well-adjusted single fellow from japan who truly loved the tranquility of the park and wanted to enjoy what it had to offer," mack said.  otero county sheriff's detectives examined fujita's rental car and found nothing that would suggest foul play, mack added.

very strange indeed!!!
content.summary: Response to submittal 32939 regarding missing businessman in white sands national park new mexico usa as found in albuquerque journal newspaper

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home south on i75 under little to no cloud cover. as i exited square lake road  approaching opdyke intersection, i noticed, across the horizon within a 1-2 miles range, 2 parallel series of equidistant separated lights (3left 2right) of increasing intensity proportionally consistent with two distinct "approach" path- patterns of airplanes- a familiar, common and regular occurrence in sw michigan given the neighboring airports namely dtw.  my  observation was initially triggered by the unusually low altitudes relative to 30 years worth of local, layman observation and the vicinity of local airports: there was nowhere for these things to land based on trajectory and location.  within seconds, the lights abruptly changed direction to convene across their linear parallel counter point,.  it looked as if the planes of two approach paths suddenly turned toward each other with increasing speed.  the lights varied in their increasing intensity and speed stopping abruptly just shy of a perpendicular alignment above a much brighter, constant, central lower light.  the topmost two pairs     convened to this central line while the one unmatched light merged entirely with the brighter light.  as the unmatched light merged with the still stationary light, their brightness doubled as 1, the approaching paralleled pairs retracted away from each other across random trajectories, with even greater speed, and just prior a new light appeared.  the "new" light was spatially and proportionally consistent with what would have paired along the initial distribution of all the lights for it to have been the match of the lower, soon to be merged light.  it appeared just prior to the others splitting off and it followed a much slower approach toward the central perpendicular line above the brightest light.   it was upon this "new" light's alignment with the center that the others repelled and the single merged with the larger. the two pairs follow dissimilar patterns in speeding off from each other, zigzagging, bouncing as they dispersed, meanwhile the new on hovered over the bottom bright one. i can not determine what occurred next because my horizontal view of this weirdness was soon consumed by the decreased elevation of the road- i couldn't see anything after i reached a certain point on the downward sloped road, approaching the intersection.  this took several seconds only.  there seemed nothing definitively significant about the lights themselves aside from the patterns of movement.  they were white-yellow- in color- maybe a little more yellow than airplanes but not anything wildly unusual like their movement.  

the observation was at about  233 degrees from the intersection of opdyke and the i75 sb exit ramp within a 1mile to 2 mile distance.

in trying to come across the accurate geometric terms to describe the lines and distance of these things relative to their movent and spatial representation, and direction, across an xy axis, i'm pretty certain it would be accurate to plot a iconsohedron shape and say the distribution and linear movement of the lights, prior to dispersion was 100% symetrically contained and occurring within the lines of an iconsohedron shape. drawn within the points of the initally observed distribution and symetry of lights serving as perimeter points  to sebsequent movement which all occurred within the interior angles of the shape.  the lowest, closest brightest light, however, occured outside the linear object along although aligned as implied extension of  its points.

 i came across some patterns of drawn shapes and linear relationships that visually represent what i saw these lights pattern across the xy axis.  though i have no real understanding of any of the math, at all, i will tell you what these geometric terms were in case any one who knows what the mathematical implications of them may find them helpful somehow- some of these terms were: paralleled  non-surjective ( 2 top lights approached each other lowest went off to "injection" ) appearance of 3rd light is like surjective composition that triggered the scattering of the others.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 5 lites convened icosahedronnaly to brighter center, 1 hovered horizonatly, 1 merged,  other 2 retracted in random pattern

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two other witnesses were talking on a side porch of our cabin in north central pennsylvania  when i noticed something brighter than normal to the north.  at first glance i thought it was either a heli or an airplane but i didn't hear anything. no rotor wash, no engine sound whatsoever.  i immediately stated to the others: "what in the $@^% is that?"  they both took notice and one took out his cell phone and took a quick photo. whatever it was, he thought it was peculiar enough to take the shot.  we are so glad he did. 

what really caught our attention was that there were two objects.  one was above the other in vertical fashion, and the distance between the two objects never changed during the entire event.  one was above a steep mountain wall, the other was below the ridge about half way down the face of the mountain.  if it weren't for this bottom light, we probably wouldn't have paid so much attention to it, but this lower light gave us depth perception as it is less than a mile away.  they seemed to slowly pulsate from an orange-ish to a red-ish and were very bright.

at first they slowly descended moving slightly left then hovered in a static position for approximately 10-13 seconds.  none of us said anything, we just watched the objects intently.
after the 10-13 second hover they slowly ascended upward.  again, both in tandem.  after a few more seconds they began to accelerate very quickly straight upward.  the rate of speed was faster than any aircraft could have moved.  the closest thing we could compare them to was similar to a shooting star, only they moved straight up.  as the objects ascended, they became more and more dim.  i said to the other guys: "they're going to disappear" and about two seconds after i said that, they did.  

i immediately asked the guys what they thought it was and one of them said "it's just something you can't explain.  you can't explain it."  i think some of the words used were "unbelievable, and holy $#@%".  we went inside the cabin and enthusiastically told others at what we had just seen.  of course, most passed it off as some kind of joke or a high tech military aircraft.  we checked the cell phone image and it validated what we saw.  the next morning after waking it was the first thought on my mind.  i had finally witnessed a ufo event.

personally, i have always believed in other beings or life forms due to the sheer math of the vastness of space.  there is absolutely no question in my mind that what we saw was non-human.  at first i found it hard to tell anyone that was not in my immediate family for fear of rejection, and i felt very strong about what we saw.  now, after reading so many other's accounts of similar sightings i have no problem telling others.  i never felt any fear or danger but i definitely felt uneasy afterward.  i have never stopped looking upward ever since.
content.summary: 2 star-like orbs in vertical formation, silent

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 55 year old business owner from raleigh, nc and have been an faa licensed pilot for 37 years. i have an interest in astronomy and am always watching the skies. on wed. night, oct. 12 around 8 pm , i was at a beachfront house in ocean isle beach, nc facing east observing the full moon and lightning flashes far out to sea. i began a 20 minute video recording with my sony sr11 hi definition camcorder to record the distant lightning which according to a weather website was over a hundred miles out to sea. during my recording, i captured over a dozen total orange glowing stationary lights at different points in the video. these lights were similar to lights i observed on three separate nights last june while on a one week vacation at the same beach. myrtle beach, sc is just south of ocean isle and i have read multiple reports of orange lights recently from that more populated tourist area.
last june, the orange lights i observed would suddenly appear and stay on for more than 30 seconds. i first thought they were distant aircraft landing lights even though they were not the usual white color. and i quickly ruled out landing lights when i watched them rotate around each other. also, one of the lights in june silently cruised horizontally at over 100 miles per hour before disappearing. during last week's sighting, they would light up for only a few seconds before fading out. i estimate the objects that appear in my video were between 1 and 2 miles away at between 500 and 1,000 feet altitude. and the objects were totally silent as they were in june.
i have uploaded to youtube a 22 second hi-definition video clip showing at least 4 of the glowing orbs. the youtube link is [link moved to field investigators section/cms/tg]. my camera was aimed east looking down the beach. among the recognizable items are a neighbor���������s white stairs to the beach, a lighted bouy which is about a mile away and a distant flashing beacon on the horizon . old baldy lighthouse on bald head island 25 miles away is visible flashing to the right. in the sky the full moon appears as a somewhat fuzzy large orb and the planet jupiter is constantly visible to the lower left of the moon.
the four orange lights appear as white on the video due to my camera���������s low light limitations.
content.summary: Multiple orange lights at ocean isle beach, nc

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son were working at a haunted hayride in northeast pa when another worker in out scene area said quick look up what it that? me and my son looked up to see what appeared to be a standard jet(noise no prop) flying over at a fast rate of speed and what appeared to be a black nonlit object roughly 50 feet in front of it . the circular object with some kind of shaped  appendages sticking off the sides made absolutley no noise and had no visible afterburners or glowing fuel source as it flew ahead of the jet as if being chased. i watched the jet fly off in the distance and never noticed anything else that night. the jet and the object it was chasing flew off in a northern direction. i can honestly say on my grandmother and sisters grave i know what i saw and it has forever changed my life
content.summary: Me and son noticed a military type jet with lights trailing a dark nolit fast moving abject within 50 feet of it overhead

content.detailedDescription:
I don't know the year for sure, but it may have been around 2003. some friends and i had gone to white sands, new mexico, that evening. after walking around on the sand at night, we were in the car and witnessed these lights hovering over us. as i recall there were about five lights to each ufo and the ufo, which were hovering, began to like tilt all the way sideways in different directions and up and down all in sync. we became immediately very frightened and left. i was scared the whole way home to el paso.
the next day or maybe day after, the news reported a missing japanese tourist from white sands from that same exact night we had been there. for the next few days (maybe week, actually), it continued to be reported on the news. they were using infra red, etc., to try to locate the tourist to no avail. then, like a week later, they find the japanese tourist, dead near his car. i was amazed! how could it take a week of an intensive search using infra red, etc. just to suddenly find him dead right near his car. they new where his car was all along.
i have always felt a very eerie feeling knowing that those bizarre ufos were hovering above white sands the same night he disappeared. and then, he shows back up dead like a week later!
the date above is made up because it was required. it was maybe 2003. i can't remember. it was when the japanese tourist was missing and then found dead, which i just googled and couldn't find.
content.summary: Lights from two ufos almost like dancing in unison, hovering above white sands

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard throwing balls to my dog. i live on the eastern side of the mountain in el paso, texas. suddenly, i observed a bright glowing blue flying object over the mountain in an area that is not accessible. no roads, rugged terrain. it was moving quickly and different directions and even seemed to flip. it disappeared and instantaneously appeared so far south that  nothing human could do that. it then appeared in the original location instantaneously again. there was nothing in the sky, as in planes, helicopters, etc. there was no way a human could have been flashing some kind of light there.
content.summary: Glowing blue spinning and moving rapidly. disappearing and reapearing a amile away instantaneously.

content.detailedDescription:
I smoked then,and got up in the middle of the night to go onto the patio to have a cigarette. as i stood there enjoying the smoke, and the quiter part of a dallas night, just off i-635w., i just happened to be checking out the sorta low clouds. then, off to my left, towards mesquite, i saw this giant football of a thing, come silently gliding through that layer of low clouds. 
no sound at all. travelling probably 100+/- mph., no more. looked to be exactly like an old pigskin, except it was about forty or so feet across, and about fiffty five or sixty feet long, in my estimation. it was not brightly lit, and had no lighting visible to me. but,while it was a dirty rusty reddish-orange color, it actually glowed as it did that. now, remembering it better, i recall thinking that it was "camoflauged".

no wings. no externally visible anything. and it never once varied it's altitude, or it's straight path. it just kept right on, straight as an arrow, and quiet as a mouse. again, i was pretty interested, but what's a guy to do? i just yawned and went back inside and crawled into bed, wondering when these pilots are going to let us in on their real secrets.
content.summary: A giant football glowing a very dull orangish rusty color.

content.detailedDescription:
A group of friends and i had travelled up into the low mountains around fruitland, washington,to help a friend and his wife raise an octagonal log two-story house on his twenty acres. but when the evening came and time to leave approached,we discovered that the vehicle needed repairs that could only be done in good daylight. the only sleeping accomodations were on rectangular bales of hay, and our cover was an tarp. a community bed, as it were, out in the wilds of nature. 

around two or so, i awoke thinking that i may have heard a bear. i had been a very light sleeper ever since boot camp, and the least thing would awaken me-- especially in grizzly country! no animal was approaching, thank god, so i lay there marvelling at the awesome display of the skies, and of course wondering how god could do all that? then something in my perifferal vision caught my eye, near the horizon. at that time of the night, the sky was entirely free of clouds and no moon, until later on.

a speck of light, a mere pinpoint, was moving way too fast to be a satellite, so i began to observe it. that pin point of light, then proceeded to rocket across the entire sky, at maybe three hundred miles elevation or more-- but it traversed the entire sky, in a perfectly excecuted zig-zag pattern! it went from horizon to horizon in probably five seconds, and as it was passing over my head, it covered at least a third of the sky, as it went from side to side! and of course, as it was so high up, and far away, it left no sound. 

the only sound was the snoring of the other sleeping friends, and my gasping at the sight i'd just seen.That and the night creatures. so, i drifted back off to sleep, but to awaken again, a couple of hours later, to check on everyone, and by then the skies had fllled up with what in texas we call 'buttermilk' skies. little puffy clouds all around. but the stars still shone brillianty, and the full moon was now up, at about ten 'oclock high. 
then out from behind, or from inside a little cloud, moved out a very bright light, appearing about a quarter of the size of the full moon. it almost looked like a lightbulb, floating about, amongst the clouds, and then up, then down-- all rather lazy and unconcerned like. and i really had to ask, "now, just what the heck is there out here in the middle of nowhere to interest you guys"? of course, i heard nothing but the night birds. i watched this light move about for approximately fifteen minutes, and then, like a light bulb indeed, it simply blinked right out. end of show, and i finally went back to sleep. and the next day, told no one.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two events that night

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up around 2:30 am, restless, and got up out of bed, and just gazed pointlessly out of the two-story bedroom window which faced the south. as i loved to watch the stars, etc. 

then it caught my eye. about twenty odd miles away to the south, was a reddish-orange dully glowing football like apparition about 500' off the ground. i could also observe occasional pulsations, and also that it seemed to have several accompanying smaller white discs. so, i assumed that i was probably watching a ufo mothership, or a reasonable facsimile of one, and of it's smaller companions. 

the reason i suspected it right off to be a ufo mother-ship, is that two of my bosses' sons were attendign a ufo festival up there at a ranch that i want to recall as buffalo ranch. however the name could be wrong. as the two boys told me the group intended to "call in" a ufo or two, i declined to go, as for one, we all had to work the next day in our very hard jobs. i did not fancy it worth the trip, and it actually sorta creeped me out. 

the next day the two young men told me that there were approximately a thousand people there in attendance. and yes, we discussed the ufos, that they had "called in". they were very proud of themselves, but something seemed just a little on the occult or spooky side, so i never pursued the matter, or went to one of their events, though i was a believer in ufos.
content.summary: I viewed a ufo manifestation from a long way off.

content.detailedDescription: On october 26, 2011 at about 7:20 p.M. my wife and i were traveling east on highway 20 west about seven miles from rome ga and about seven miles from the alabama state line in an area called the narrows.  the coosa river is near on the right.  we observed a large object traveling from  southeast to northwest.  as it cleared the treetops on the right side of the road, we saw a smaller object behind it that looked more like a plane and behind that a larger object that looked more like the first.  the first and third objects had three lights on each side that were too far apart to be a plane and they didn't blink.  the lights on these larger objects seemed to be attached to the object by appendages instead of being directly on the object.  it was that time of day when it is not completely dark but not light so we couldn't really tell the shape of any of the objects.  they flew very low and made no sound.  they crossed the road and disappeared into the mountains that are directly on the left side of the road.  the last object seemed to descend slightly which was very odd since it was already flying so low.
content.summary: Three objects-two large and one smaller just after sundown west of rome ga very low in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I, younger brother, and mother were awakened by stepdad, when he came home very excited from his late shift at tinker afb, where he was stationed then. 1952. late summer or autumn. stepdad dragged us all out to see where a ufo had briefly landed, mere blocks from where we lived, near tinker afb. all we got to see, aside from the stepdad airman in a highly excited state, was a round area approx. 45-50' across. grass toasted and depressed evenly. want to say there were depressions in the ground, but that part is not well remembered. all i really knew just then, was that i and my little brother were eager to get back home for breakfast,and to play with our pet hamsters.

because the stepdad was teaching me to know and identify all american military and civilian aircraft, i was noting that he kept telling our mother that several of these ufos had been operating over this nuclear strategic air command base for many hours that night, causing a great deal of havoc, but mostly they were turning on and off the nuclear weapons, from their hovering positions in the air above. also that the u.S. airforce nuclear forces there at tinker were completely at the mercy and disposal of these ufos. he was adamant that the airforce had no power to resist them, or shoot them down, while the ufos were operating in the area.

i recall it making my mother extremely nervous, and of course we could all see my stepdad, (name moved to fi box) cms 10/28/11 21:13 cst flg, becoming even more excited as he retold the night's events--- but at the time, ufos just didn't compute in my  little brain. 

as i was approximately four years old, it really had little effect on me then, at least as i recall. however, it must have had a profound effect on our stepdad, richard, as he was always watching the skies after that. i don't know about before this event. 

it is pretty important that the entire staff on tinker afb likely saw these ufos that night. also, it must be true that numerous civilians also saw them, and had to be curious about them. after all, tinker is in the middle of midwest city, oklahoma, and that is a suburb of oklahoma city, oklahoma! a very large city, even in 1952.
content.summary: Small/glowing/discoid/approx. 50'diam.

content.detailedDescription: On october 26, 2011 in mesa, az around 2:42 pm, i was sitting in my lawn chair (located on my porch) watching the sky towards the northwest.  as i was watching the sky,  i saw a balloon size object just instantly appear in the sky from the west, and the object was traversing very swiftly in the sky like a fast and high moving jet.  at first that's what i thought it was traversing: a high flying jet that just appeared in the sky.  but suddenly i realized that it wasn't a jet, and i promptly began thinking that it may possibly be a balloon that was quickly traversing with the wind which the wind was blowing towards the east at a great gust.  i immediately started taking pictures of the object.  after taking a few pictures of it, i quickly reviewed one picture to see if the object looked like a balloon in the reviewer.  the object didn't look anything similar to a balloon in features after reviewing it via the camera's picture reviewer, so i continued taking more pictures of the object that was traversing. the object also seemed like it was slightly changing it's shape while traversing, and the object had drastically slow down in the sky to almost a crawl which to me appeared to be resisting the wind that was blowing on it.  the object appeared somewhat brownish in color with a hint of yellow in it or possibly even a slight orange color too.  it also appeared to have a furry-like surface or a fuzzy surface similar to a peach.  after thinking initially of it being a jet then a balloon, i quickly began realizing that it's movements was beginning to contradict the balloon possibility yet it was traversing somewhat similar to be a balloon. the object was about 70 feet up in the air, and it was about 100 to 150 feet away from my location.  it appeared to be traveling with the wind which was blowing from the west to east at a good gust of maybe 25 to 35 mph.  the object was traveling in the air at a steady slow rate which in the beginning appeared to had been traveling with the wind in great speed.  the object was clearly seen in the sky, and it was not always round in shape.  when trees started to obscure my viewing of the object, i quickly hurried to the front of my house in order to continue viewing the object and to continued taking more pictures of the object too.  normally, i wouldn't do this if i thought it was just a balloon traversing, and especially if it appeared to be exactly like a balloon while quickly reviewing it via the camera's picture reviewer.  while taking pictures, i included lots of landmarks such as trees, buildings, etc while i zoomed out to 70mm.  i really didn't want to zoom out; however i also still continued zooming in onto the object too in order to get as much close-up pictures as possible too.  i  realize when showing the pictures to people that it may be difficult for some people to judge the size of the object in the picture unless there was possibly some structural feature to help in judging the size of the object; therefore, that's the main reason why i included landmarks while taking pictures of the object.   while viewing the objects with just my eyes, it instantly disappeared in the sky.  i quickly started taking random shots in the sky in the general area where the object was last seen.  i managed to get one more picture of the object while not seeing it with my eyes.  the object appeared to had quickly traverse across the sky rather than it just instantly vanishing; yet the lighting part instantly disappear before my eyes.  the sky was partly cloudy and a little hazy.  the wind was blowing very hard towards the east. the temperature was about 85 degrees f. no sound from the object was heard. no reflection of sunlight was seen.  four minutes earlier, a troop-carrying type helicopter from the az national guards (united states army) number 136 had pass through the area heading west on the same pathway and at the same altitude the objects had traverse in the sky while it went east in direction.  it is possible (hypothetically and from my perspective) that the helicopter may had even pass each other while both were in flight.  it was not until i downloaded the pictures and examining each picture that i can safely say beyond any doubt that it was not a balloon traversing in the sky. the helicopter was last seen at 14:38 hours, and the object was first seen at 14:42 hours, and the object last seen at 14:45 hours for a total sighting duration  of 3 minutes.  time difference between sighting helicopter and object: 4 minutes.
content.summary: Instantly appearing, transforming bright object (balloon size) that traverse fast then slowly at close range and at low altitude, then instantly disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
on september of 1978 , at approx. 7:20 pm , i happened to be walking my dog in a small church parking lot on broadway at franklin st in san francisco. i happened to look up at the edge of a two story building and noticed the edge of something moving out over the  roof of the building. suddendly a small craft , row boat sized with a central rim about the center and two steep tail fins floated out from the roof. then a second craft moved by it's side and i realized it was the second fin i had observed. they were silent and the skin of the craft was sort of a soft reflective whiteish-silver with a  faint orange glow. one craft rocked back and forth slightly. both craft were less then 25 feet from me, i literally could have hit them with a stone. i of course was in some sort of shock but i felt both elation , a desire to go with them and a sense of panic, realizing that there was no mistaking what i was seeing. after about 10 seconds they took off and banked up and over a 10 story building then  i observed them directly over the golden gate bridge as two orange lights.
that month , there were numerious and varied ufo sightings in the sf region and several over sf.
content.summary: 2 craft hovered building , 20 feet , above,10 seconds, scaled building then over gg bridge

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i took my kids to the "marfa mamy lights" (thats what we call them)to see if they were out & sure enough they were. this time i got really scared because it seemed as if they were coming closer& closer to me so i'd turn on my headlights &they'd back off. there were several different ones, but at one time there were 3 as in the shape of a triangle, then they vanished, then they came back. some blinked others were always bright, others seemed to get brightern them dim down n then  brite agagin n move up, down, left, right, sometimes fast n othertimes slow. i have been seeing these "things" for approx. 5-6 mos. they r more active when there is no moon. its crazy, 
idk what they could be but it's going to drive me crazy til this isinvestigated n explained. come n see them, it's like they like company i think, but i dont ever get out of my car cuz idk what they r or what they r capable of. 
please come n help me find a logical explanation 2 all this crazyness i've discovered.
                                      thank you,
                                      (name moved to fi box ) 10/28/11 21:23 cst flg
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Similar to the marfa lights in marfa tx. they come toward you at times

content.detailedDescription: I discovered this silver object just above the branch and to the left of the tree after i had come in from taking the two pictures. i was standing at my front door facing west to get pictures of the snow to email to my husband who was out of town. when i zoomed in on the object i noticed that it had an unusual shape. in the second picture it had change it shape or direction but was in the same general location. we live just to the south west of a us army post. we have a lot of military craft fly over but they are all painted dark green or black and make a lot of noise. there is also a small air field to the south of me but all of the planes that go over from there make a lot of noise. i didn't hear anything. it seems too shinny to be a bird. i was wondering if you could tell me what it might be.
content.summary: Silver object captured in picture on the left side just above the tree branch

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i had just gotten to my house in marshfield, wi and we were unloading items from the trunk. it was a very clear night. my girlfriend looked up at the stars and commented on what a beautiful night it was. she suddenly said, "what is that?", and pointed to the west. i looked up and saw flying over the holiday inn hotel a massive black perfect triangle with dim red lights at the points (non flashing) coming directly toward us. the craft was on a straight e by s/e flight path and traveling at a high rate of speed. it was a clear night and we could see the aircraft very well. we could distinctly see the outline and edges of the craft and it blocked out the stars as it flew in front of them.  i'm not sure what phase the moon was in, but the craft was fairly illuminated, perhaps from the lights of the city. it flew directly overhead but slightly to the north of us so we could see the right side of the ship. the ufo was flat black with a smooth bottom surface. we could definitely see structure on the right side of the ship, but couldn't make out if they were windows or parts of the ship.  the ufo was a perfect triangle in shape and looked nothing like any aircraft i have ever seen. i have seen the f-117 stealth fighter and the b-2 stealth bomber fly and it was definitely not one of these aircraft. i knew immediately that i was looking at a ufo, and i have read about and seen many pictures and videos of this black triangle ufo on tv and the internet. at the points of the triangle were dim red lights that were not flashing, but were on steadily. the ship was flat in appearance but quite thick (top to bottom). the thickness of the craft was about 10% of the length of the right side, maybe more.  i would estimate the craft to be about the size of 2 jumbo jets and was at an altitude of approximately 1,000 feet, but could have been as high as 5,000 ft depending on the exact size of the craft. however, i don't think we could have seen the detail that we did if the craft was above 1,000 ft, plus it wouldn't have been illuminated by the city lights.  as i said earlier, the ufo was traveling at a high rate of speed, and based on seeing the speed of fighter jets, i would say the ufo was traveling sub-sonic. but it was definitely moving faster than a commercial airliner. as a result of the ufo's speed, we were only able to observe it for approximately 4 -5 seconds before it flew out of view (which was blocked by trees and houses), however, those few seconds seemed to last a lifetime. what astonished us the most was a total lack of sound from the craft as it flew over and disappeared from sight. the only thing we could hear was the soft sound of the air rushing over the aircraft. a few years ago, two b-1 bombers did a flyby over the city of marshfield for a funeral service. the house i lived in at the time was directly under the flight path of these 2 planes. i was standing outside at the time and the noise from these 2 jets was deafening and literally almost rattled the windows out of my house. the ufo we saw was at, or less than, the same altitude as the 2 bombers, and i would guess less. also, the ufo left absolutely no trail in the air behind the craft and we couldn't see any kind of air disturbance around the craft. after we lost sight of the ufo i immediately looked at my cell phone to check the time and it was 10:35 pm. the ufo was on an e by s/e flight path and was headed directly for steven's point, wi about 36 miles away. both of us were totally freaked out at what we saw. my girlfriend kept repeatedly saying, "what the f*** was that?" i was in udder shock for about 20 seconds and then started screaming, "oh my god! that was a f***ing alien spaceship!" the second time i screamed it even louder. my girlfriend immediately grabbed me and put her hand over my mouth to keep me from disturbing the neighbors. then she said to me, "what do we do now? should we call 911?" i said, "i don't know. they'll probably just think we're drunk or crazy." so the two us grabbed our stuff and headed into the house. we were both in utter disbelief & excited at we saw and we kept talking about it. i then picked up my phone and told my friend what i saw. next, both of us posted on facebook what had just happened. initially, i stated on facebook that i thought the ufo was at an altitude of 500 feet, but after i thought about it for awhile, i estimated the craft was probably twice that. my girlfriend and i were so excited about what we had seen we couldn't fall asleep. at 12:45 am we were still talking about it and in the morning it was the very first thing we discussed. 

as a back ground note, i am very familiar with seeing all types of aircraft fly, and i have been to many military and civilian air shows. i have even been in a military flight simulator for a rc-135. i have seen every plane fly in the us military and i have seen f-18's, and f-16's fly super sonic. so i know, and am very familiar with, the silhouette of all military aircraft, including the flight characteristics, size and aircraft speed.
content.summary: Massive black perfect triangle with dim red lights at points (non flashing), we could see craft very well.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my back porch of my apartment,i had bean standing for a minute fixing to call a friend.I noticed something shying and moving super fast.I got a real good look i had my glasses on , after a second or two it stopped and made a sharp right turn i got author good look and i was no plane.After i called my friend and told him.
   
         thank you
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Standing on my back porch clear sky silver foot moving faster than a jet makes sudden stop 90.Turn &10000mph takeoff

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 7:00 in the evening of jan,14,2009, i was at work at the sharyland water plant, alone with no witnesses, there were automobiles passing by on the road but i do not know if any body was paying attentionand i was in an elevated position about 12 foot or so above the road. i noticed the object because of the powerful light it was emitting, not a beam but more like a solid light with a slight aura, pure white with no other colors.  it was moving slowly from a position south east of mine, approximately 200 degrees or so, moving slightly south/southwest along treetop level. the trees in the video are about 500 to 1000 feet from were i
was shooting the video from, so this is what i used to estimate distance to the objects location, though i can not eliminate the possibility that it may have been further south than i estimated, it did appear to be illuminating the trees slightly and the effect is visible in the clip. it continued moving along its path and appeared to hover in position for a short period of time, then continued its south/south west course. until it was to far behind the trees to be seen any more. duration of sighting was about 3-4 minutes. i was excited somewhat, but since i have been researching ufo activity since i was 9 years old, i was not overwhelmed by the sighting,i have continued to see the object, though never as close as it was in this video. and have more video of the object that i have shot since that time up until a few weeks ago. i believe this is the same object or objects.
content.summary: Very bright sperical light moving slowly then hovering and then moving

content.detailedDescription:
At 4:36 a.M. on october 28, 2011, i observed a large bright light approximately 10 degrees to the northeast and approximately 15 degrees above the horizon. the bright object was moving slowly toward the southwest. my observation was from the front picture window of my house up on a hill. the object was under a solid cloud cover.
at first i thought the object was airplane landing lights, but out of the usual flight path. as it got closer and larger i turned around to a nearby table to get some small binoculars out of the drawer, but when i turned back around the object had disappeared. the object was visible and caught my eye when i first came into the room. i observed it for a couple of minutes before reaching for the binoculars. after the object disapeared, i observed the sky for another few minutes to make sure it was not an aircraft. 
during my observation, there were no other aircraft in my field of vision, which from northern tennessee to southern kentucky is unlimited.
content.summary: Observed large bright object under cloud cover

content.detailedDescription:
In sept. 2011, i started having this feeling like we my family and i were being watched, i thought someone maybe watching us to break in our home or something.  my husband told told me it was probably nothing.  but then we started seeing lights at night walking the field and we thought we were hearing 4 wheelers on our land, the next morning, i would always look to see if there were and tracks, and thing did look differant to me.  we have 8 acres of land and our land meets up with a golf course that has been closed down for about a year, and the other side of our land meets up with pasture land.  on night my husband was outside looking up at the stars, and he came in the house very excited and said he saw a light in the sky just turn off like a light bulb.  soon after that our 9 year old son told that earlier in the summer, probably august, he saw a ball of light go hover around a tree and then it took off, he said he didnt want to tell us because he didnt want us to thing he was tell a story.
our family has always been star gazers, but since the lights my husband and son saw, we really started looking up at the stars.  at first we noticed how all the stars in the sky were formed like triangles small ones and very large ones, we also started watching a really bright star, we thought at first, it my have been a planet, we looked at it with our binoculars and it looked like a large jelly fish with hundreds of lights in it.  later on we find out that it was no star or planet, it some kind of jet.  this jet made a noise at first, but then when it hovered, it was completely silent. it was hard to film it, cause it would turn my flash off on my camera and when i walked back inside, my flash would come back on.
there are too many events that have happened to list my husband and i will gladly speak to someone about this.
the ships and beings are still here, and have been here for at least a month of two.  my husband and i have tons of pictures and videos we would love for someone to view.  someone is more than welcome to come to our home and view this for themselves.  we arent sure how long they will be here.  on one of the videos, you can plainly see a light being on the roof of our home and we are talking to him and he is talking to us.  its a must see.  
please contact us asap, we dont know what is going on here....
in one of the pictures i am sending, its a circle with in a circle on my back cant explain where it came from, that happened twice.  we have lots more pictures to show and videos.
also note that there are jets flying all around our house, night and day all hours.. and also a neighbor has noticed the jets also.  they fly very low like tree top level even.
please contact us soon!!
thank you
content.summary: Has been here at least 4 wks and is still here.  lots  of disc landing in trees.  they are like light beings and greys and so much more.  when a being is present you can see like heat waves.

content.detailedDescription: On october 28, 2011 at approximately 2:45 a.M. i noticed an object in the sky that looked like a comet. i caught view of it through the front windshield, to the left (i am in the front passenger seat) my first thought was "comet". but after watching it for a few seconds it looked like it was gaining altitude. however, being the passenger in the car i was able to keep my eye on it and the ground and it was not gaining altitude. this was when i thought it was possibly a crashing plane or helicopter but the object seemed to be moving at a slow rate of speed. plus, the glowing comet-like tail it had that was bright white in the center and orange all around suddenly stopped. at this point we were starting to pull over and i was reaching for my cell phone so i could film it.  the object lost its comet like tail and hovered.  i did not take my eyes off of it. it hovered for about 30 seconds. this object was bright white and looked as if it had blinking lights on it. as we made our way over a lane or two in order to pull over and film it, the comet tail came back. the object moved abruptly to the right and then, instantly, just like in the movies, it vanished. it left behind a ring of smoke that we both described as a "poof". what we saw this evening defied the normal. we are currently driving out of town...A family trip to the seqouias and we are baffled by what we witnessed just over an hour ago. it made zero sense and i find it difficult to describe in words because what i saw happen in the night sky does not compute! it's unexplainable, but it isn't because i watched it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Noticed object that looked like a comet move very slow in the sky, changed directions or altitude, hovered and then vanished.
